ControlPanel_NoPNG: No PNG images were detected in the specified directory, the specified directory can be found in Options Panel of this mod.
ControlPanel_ScrollWheel: Scroll the wheel to change, Shift X10, Ctrl X0.1
ControlPanel_SelectedImageWarning: When selected an image, the image pixel information needs to be loaded, and loading time depends on the number of pixels of image.
MOD_Description: Overlay images on top of the map, allowing you to replicate real city.
ReloadError: Make sure the PNG file is properly placed.
ResetWarning: Are you sure you want to reset to the default parameters?
UpdateLog_V1_8_4UPT: Updated to the latest common framework.
UpdateLog_V1_8_5FIX0: Fixed an issue where placing PNG files after loading the game would not display images.
UpdateLog_V1_8_5FIX1: Fixed an issue with incorrect PNG folder directory in the option panel under OSX system.
UpdateLog_V1_8_5UPT1: UUI button and separate tool button are now optional.
UpdateLog_V1_9_0ADD0: Added independent support for multiple image parameters.
UpdateLog_V1_9_0ADD1: Added support for looping image shortcuts.
